welcome_message_body: Welcome to Tirana, the vibrant capital city of Albania! Get ready to be captivated by its unique blend of history, culture, and modern charm. Explore the colorful streets, bustling markets, and rich culinary scene, and immerse yourself in all that Tirana has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Rinas Mother Teresa Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: VIP Terminal
terminals.description: The VIP terminal at Rinas Mother Teresa Airport provides exclusive services for high-profile travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
